tweets.text: @talbconsultancy @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe Latest ‘silent’ update as the Walleys quarry calls overload the incident line today. Simple question- Why are you not tackling the cause it’s now a @PHE_uk Situation. Disgraceful @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/nlkiD2OkHp
@talbconsultancy @EnvAgencyMids First rule of CEO school - continued silence from a leader means  @StinkStopthe #stopthestink #environmentalcrisis https://t.co/mO5qmJKQ0c

We recognise concerns about odour around #WalleysQuarry landfill & how difficult this is for local people. We’ve had officers out today to check odour & will continue to do so. We’re aware of increased wait times on our hotline so please remember you can email us too. https://t.co/Oj3QeLcCfq
@EnvAgencyMids I woke up this morning, eyes sti ging, it's no fun...
We've had a spike in the number of heating oil leaks being reported - check your oil tanks https://t.co/yFyHxnkeZx

tweets.text: @benking01 @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency That time was long ago. But, better late than never.

@AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids Response please!NUL and wider areas are suffering. We can't leave due to lockdown, we can't open windows, the stench is intolerable. We need intervention. This is a nuisance under the Environmental Act, we can't be comfortable in our homes

domain.name: Ongoing News Story
domain.description: Ongoing News Stories like 'Brexit'

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL Situation at Whalley's is a disgrace. Why is the equipment not working? Why put it there and not activate? Why didn't the EA VISIT when started getting hundreds of complaints? Questions need answering, now @StinkStopthe https://t.co/6kaHnTZ7gG

@fayedavies @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids No whitewashing should be endured and no more soothing words and empty promises. @RedIndustries2 has to do more than the bare minimum and play their role as a genuine part of the community. No more lip service. #StopTheStink @DaveJonesNuL @CllrTonyK @AFH7_fbu @CllrStubbsNUL https://t.co/iIGyYCCOC2

@scottdegg @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL This has been happening for years, it is people power that has got a response. We need to come together right now but in the long term look at WHO and HOW we got to this point. Some members of the council and EA need looking at, very closely.

@EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe Thanks @AaronBell4NUL for doing your ‘sniff test’rounds tonight if you see the @EnvAgency as well, who are out, can you tell us? They are struggling to keep us informed, on their findings tonight... I’m sure they are out 🤥Keep sniffing, it’s ‘ripe’ @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

@EnvAgencyMids It is now after 2.30am, we cannot sleep, where are you? Why haven't you got control of this? Is you equipment now 'turned on'? The management of the EA needs review, this has been going on for years.

@scottdegg @SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe Would really appreciate some cross party support and thanks as Tagg and Bell seem so keen on it when they are asked searching questions. Less Tory back slapping - this has been an issue for years, not three weeks.

@SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe Well Simon let’s just hope they are...Their proven track record of success speaks for itself, we all have the upmost confidence in their ability to communicate, record, monitor and regulate this environmental crisis 🤥

@EnvAgency 
INR: 1851979
9th March 2021

With only 5mm of rain recorded in last 13 days, pollution at the end of this septic tank system is clearly visible now the clean groundwater ingress dilution has temporarily ceased.

Brown to the right is normal soil pushed out by a mole https://t.co/e41AfAHBVh
